result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Antoine Zebadiah Edwards

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Antoine Zebadiah Edwards appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Brett Lee Copeland appeared by video for Antoine Zebadiah Edwards.  Attorney Michael Lonski in court for State of Wisconsin.  Calendared today for a plea however, Attorney Copeland recently appointed and requests adjourned status.
Status conference scheduled for November 30, 2022 at 10:00 am.
State Public Defender - Order Appointing Counsel received and filed.  bm
Notice of Completion of Representation by Attorney Colleen Taylor received and filed.  bm
Order to Withdraw signed and filed.  bm
Motion to Withdraw received and filed.  bm

Defendant Antoine Zebadiah Edwards in court, in custody.  Attorney Colleen A Taylor in court for Antoine Zebadiah Edwards.  Attorney Michael Jerome Lonski in court for State of Wisconsin. Deputy Court Clerk:  bm 
Status Conference held.  Defense requests a Projected Guilty Plea date.
Plea hearing scheduled for October 31, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Antoine Zebadiah Edwards in court with attorney Colleen A Taylor.  Defendant Antoine Zebadiah Edwards in custody.  Jennifer Tate for Michael Jerome Lonski appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk:  bm
Status Conference held.  Attorney Taylor makes first appearance and requests adjourned status date as she is still reviewing discovery.  Court grants request.  Status conference scheduled for September 15, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Antoine Zebadiah Edwards in court with attorney Robert J Hampton.  Defendant Antoine Zebadiah Edwards in custody.  Michael Jerome Lonski appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk:  bm
  Motion of the defense counsel to withdraw granted by the Court.  Attorney Colleen Taylor will be new attorney of record.  Court orders case adjourned.  Status conference scheduled for August 4, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Antoine Zebadiah Edwards in court with attorney Robert J Hampton.  Defendant Antoine Zebadiah Edwards in custody.  Michael Jerome Lonski appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: nk
Case in Court for Plea Hearing.  Defense requested an adjournment due to Defense still in negotiation with State.  Plea hearing scheduled for July 27, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Victim Impact Statement.  Received and Filed.  nk

Defendant Antoine Zebadiah Edwards in court with attorney Robert J Hampton.  Defendant Antoine Zebadiah Edwards in custody.  Michael Jerome Lonski appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk:  bm
Status Conference held.  Defense requests a projected guilty plea date.  Court grants request and authorizes transfer of Case 22CF000167 for global resolution from Branch 28.  Plea hearing scheduled for June 3, 2022 at 09:00 am.

Defendant Antoine Zebadiah Edwards in court with attorney Robert J Hampton.  Defendant Antoine Zebadiah Edwards in custody.  Michael Jerome Lonski appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk:  bm
  Defense counsel waived reading of the Information and entered a plea of not guilty on behalf of defendant.  Defense requests a status date.  Status conference scheduled for April 6, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Antoine Zebadiah Edwards in court with Attorney Robert J Hampton; both appear by video.  Defendant Antoine Zebadiah Edwards in custody.  Michael Lonski appeared in person for the State of Wisconsin.  
Case set for a Preliminary Hearing. Parties are advised that this case is assigned to Branch 12, Judge David Borowski. Defendant waived Preliminary Hearing. Preliminary Hearing Questionnaire and Waiver received and filed. Court held colloquy with defendant. Probable cause has been found and the defendant is bound over for trial.  Original Information e-filed, copy given to defense counsel who waived reading. Defense requests an arraignment date. Case is adjourned to Br. 12.   This hearing will be streamed live on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCqYxLDHV-xN_RkKf_fE1jjw  Arraignment scheduled for February 22, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
State Public Defender - Order Appointing Counsel received and filed,.  bm

Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 5.
  No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.

Defendant Antoine Zebadiah Edwards in court with attorney Evan Barrett Weitz.  Defendant Antoine Zebadiah Edwards in custody.  Kaitlyn Lewis appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   All parties appeared by video conference.
  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Borowski, Branch 12. Defendant given a copy of the complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause to hold the defendant for further proceedings.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND PUBLIC DEFENDER WILL PROVIDE COUNSEL.  Case is adjourned for preliminary hearing in Branch 12.
  Commissioner advised DNA sample has been obtained from the Defendant.  Court advised Defendant he/she may qualify to have the DNA sample data expunged if he/she meets the conditions under Wisconsin Statutes Section 165.77(4).  Preliminary hearing scheduled for January 26, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
